title: Natural & Alternative Treatments | EBSCO
description: This database focuses on alternative and holistic approaches to health care and wellness. Designed for consumer health researchers and clinicians, Natural & Alternative Treatments is an essential tool that satisfies an ever-growing demand for accurate, unbiased natural health information.
cleaned_text: Alternative Treatments This database focuses on alternative and holistic approaches to health care and wellness. Designed for consumer health researchers and clinicians, Natural & Alternative Treatments is an essential tool that satisfies an ever-growing demand for accurate, unbiased natural health information. Evidence-Based Research Covering Natural Health Topics Natural & Alternative Treatments cites more than 12,000 clinical research studies across 700 articles containing information on medical conditions, alternative therapies, herbs and supplements, functional foods, drug interactions and homeopathy. Subjects Include: - Acupuncture - Chinese herbal medicine - Western herbal medicine - Cranial-sacral therapy - Reflexology - Vitamin supplements - Herbs and supplements, such as fish oil, green tea, L. Acidophilus and L. Casei Information provided in this database should not be viewed as a means for self-diagnosis or a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment.
